Decent game, did two full rounds of the game and its short... Real short. I think I bought it for 20 when it first came out, its 10 atm. If you can get this for like 5 bucks and under, sure may be worth that. None of it is super hard, just a novelty game until Portal 2 came and did everything better. Dont recommend at a price above 5 bucks though.

cake

Es un buen juego, esta en el mismo universo de Half life 2, pero sabe resaltar por si mismo, en esta entrega, que salio el mismo día que HL2 EP2, te explican quien era la empresa rival de Black mesa, aunque en EP2 los Dr Kleiner y Eli Vance los mencionan como "colegas" sin mucha competitividad,  en este juego se descubre que la compañía si le tenia odio a BMS XD. 
Es un juego con una banda sonora muy buena, te recomiendo que lo consigas con el Valve Pack, es un juego muy distinto a su hermano HL pues mas allá de la acción y oscuridad acá es mas para ponerte a pensar y tomarte tu tiempo en un ambiente chill que va poniéndose un poco turbio mientras avanzas en la historias, es rejugable dependiendo la persona.  (La segunda entrega es mucho mejor que la primera xD)

My personal favorite game of all time. Storyline and twists are truly incredible. While the main campaign is very short on replay, it can last a good 3-5 hours on a first playthrough. Still short, but the pacing is perfect to make it feel like a full game. The master levels just make this game though. They truly are difficult and add a fun challenge to a game that is surprisingly difficult on your first run. Just a truly perfect game, and a game that anyone can like
very problem solving oriented. hours of fun. the cake is a lie.
It really is a good game. It makes you think in different ways

Here are the ingredients to make a replica of the protal cake:

1) 10 ounces of semisweet chocolate (or bittersweet, coarsely chopped)
2) 7 ounces of butter (salted or unsalted, cut into pieces)
3) 5 large eggs (at room temperature)
4) 1 cup of sugar
5) 6 strawberries (for the topping)
6) 1 candle

I do not write reviews for video games, but this one is quite special. I have replayed this game a dozen times, and each time I revisit the cold depths of Portal's oceans, I feel a sense of revamped adventure that I can't describe, and no other game can pull out of me. Experience this game in its entirety, every nook a cranny has something beautiful within it.
